Regulation Name(s): Nucleic Acid-Based Device For The Amplification, Detection, And Identification Of Microbial Pathogens Directly From Whole Blood Specimens
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for T2Candida 1.1 Panel, a qualitative molecular assay for Candida species using T2Dx Instrument with T2 magnetic resonance detection and PCR from whole blood specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of Candida species directly from K2EDTA human whole blood specimens in patients with suspected or at-risk invasive fungal infection, identifying five Candida species grouped as three targets, performed independent of blood culture on the T2Dx Instrument.
